channel.title: CVE Feed for PowerISO -- PowerISO
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PowerISO -- PowerISO

item.title: CVE-2022-41992|2024-09-17T02:16:32.611Z -- poweriso -- poweriso
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the VHD File Format parsing CXSPARSE record functionality of PowerISO PowerISO 8.3. A specially-crafted file can lead to an out-of-bounds write. A victim needs to open a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
